description: Details of Verification Report in Phase 1c, in compliance with Condition 20 of Planning Permission 2018/02100/COMB dated 8 February 2019.Please find enclosed details submitted to seek full discharge of condition 20 for Phase 1c.In respect of submitting a Verification Report, please find enclosed Atkin???s Verification Report (W504-ATK-XX-XX-RP-EV-1100-0005) dated January 2024 for the full discharge of Planning Condition 20 for Phase 1c. The Phase 1a, 1b & 1c Planning Condition Submission Strategy (W504-STW-XX-XX-TK-TE-9900-0001 (Rev P06)) is included in the appended document.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
